channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Remembering Ozzy Osbourne: Where to stream his MTV reality show for free
item.description: Heavy metal legendOzzy Osbourne diedat 76 years old yesterday, about five years after publicly announcing a Parkinson’s disease and emphysema diagnosis.

item.title: Florida State QB doubles down on Alabama trash talk ahead of opener
FHSAA to review recruiting bylaws after Teddy Bridgewater suspension
item.description: The Florida Department of Education has formally taken steps to address fairness and competition in the Florida High School Athletic Association.

item.title: VOTE for Sarasota-Manatee's all-time best state championship volleyball team
item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the area volleyball teams that have won state championships.

item.title: Watch as William McNeil speaks publicly since viral arrest video
item.description: High-profile civil rights attorney Ben Crump stood alongside 22-year-old William Anthony McNeil Jr. on July 23 as McNeilpublicly spoke for the first time since his violent arrest.

item.title: JetBlue launching new routes, bringing back old ones to…
item.description: A few months before ending service to Miami, JetBlue is beefing up its focus on Fort Lauderdale with new routes, more flights on existing routes, and more premium flights.

item.title: Cook Out is coming to Florida. Here's where new…
item.description: Florida is finally, officially invited to join a 10-state cookout.Cook Out, probably the only fast food restaurant where you can order a quesadilla as a side to your cheeseburger, is expanding to the Sunshine State after 36 years of service andmore than 350 locationsthroughout the southeast.

item.title: Court says couple can sue over gun range noise in Florida
item.description: TALLAHASSEE — An appeals court July 23 allowed an Okaloosa County couple to pursue a lawsuit over noise from a neighboring gun range, saying a 1999 state law aimed at shielding gun ranges from liability violated the couple’s constitutional rights.

item.title: Ghislaine Maxwell subpoenaed to testify behind bars on…
item.description: Amid a day of blockbuster disclosures in the case of the lateconvicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, a U.S. House committeeissued a subpoenafor Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell to appear at a deposition in the federal women's prison in Tallahassee, Florida, where she is serving her20-year sentence.

item.title: Did you win $325 million? Check Powerball tickets for…
item.description: Will a$2 Powerball ticket make you a multimillionaire? As they say in the lottery business, “it could happen to you.”

item.description: I like and respect Louis Kosiba, a Nathan Benderson Park Conservancy board member who volunteers to work at Nathan Benderson Park events.
